description: Update admin interface for viewing and managing interest requests (not demo requests). The data should be pulled from HubSpot CRM, not local database. Implement: 1) Interest request list page at /admin/interest-requests, 2) Table showing: name, email, company, submitted date, status (new, contacted, qualified), 3) Filtering by status, date range, lead source, 4) Search by name or email, 5) Detail view showing full submission information from HubSpot, 6) Status update workflow (mark as contacted, qualified, closed), 7) Integration with HubSpot API to sync status updates back to CRM, 8) Export to CSV functionality. Data is fetched from HubSpot, not stored locally. Apply admin role guard. Update from demo-request-admin-view.
title: Admin Interest Request Management View

descriptionHistory.description: Create admin interface for viewing and managing demo requests. Implement: 1) Demo request list page at /admin/demo-requests, 2) Table showing: name, email, company, submitted date, status (new, contacted, scheduled, closed), 3) Filtering by status, date range, company size, 4) Search by name or email, 5) Detail view showing full submission information, 6) Status update workflow (mark as contacted, schedule demo, close), 7) Integration with HubSpot to sync status updates back to CRM, 8) Export to CSV functionality for sales team. Use Refine useTable hook with GraphQL data provider. Apply admin role guard.
